alert.note: Alert for Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Nevada County through 615 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bodcaw, or 13 miles east of Hope, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rosston, Willisville, Bodcaw, Bluff City, White Oak Lake State Park, Cale, Mount Moriah, Young, Sutton, Morris, Waterloo and Laneburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
